price: そこには（頭や腹の）痛みもなければ、それゆえに理性を失うこともない。
arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
